languages.text: {n}Старик сгребает засаленные талоны, счастливо ощеривается и, посторонившись и причмокивая, принимается их пересчитывать.{/n} "Милостив{mf|ец|ица}! Кормил{mf|ец|ица}! Храни тебя Лорд-капитан!"
{n}The old man scoops up the greasy cards, grins happily, and moves aside to count them, smacking his lips.{/n} "Benefactor! Nourisher! May the Lord Captain protect you!"
languages.original_text: {n}Старик сгребает засаленные талоны, счастливо ощеривается и, посторонившись и причмокивая, принимается их пересчитывать.{/n} "Милостив{mf|ец|ица}! Кормил{mf|ец|ица}! Храни тебя Лорд-капитан!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man scoops up the greasy cards, grins happily, and moves aside to count them, smacking his lips.{/n} "Benefactor! Nourisher! May the Lord Captain protect you!"

{n}The old man scoops up the greasy cards, grins happily, and moves aside to count them, smacking his lips.{/n} "Benefactor! Nourisher! May the Lord Captain protect you!"

languages.text: {n}El anciano recoge las tarjetas grasientas, sonríe felizmente y se aparta para contarlas mientras se relame.{/n} «¡Benefactor{mf||a}! ¡Nutridor{mf||a}! ¡Que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán te proteja!».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man scoops up the greasy cards, grins happily, and moves aside to count them, smacking his lips.{/n} "Benefactor! Nourisher! May the Lord Captain protect you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano recoge las tarjetas grasientas, sonríe felizmente y se aparta para contarlas mientras se relame.{/n} «¡Benefactor{mf||a}! ¡Nutridor{mf||a}! ¡Que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán te proteja!».

languages.text: {n}老人は脂ぎったカードを救い上げて幸せそうに笑う。そして脇に寄り、唇をほころばせてカードの数を数える。{/n}「恩人よ！栄養補給者！ロード・キャプテンがお守りくださりますように！」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man scoops up the greasy cards, grins happily, and moves aside to count them, smacking his lips.{/n} "Benefactor! Nourisher! May the Lord Captain protect you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は脂ぎったカードを救い上げて幸せそうに笑う。そして脇に寄り、唇をほころばせてカードの数を数える。{/n}「恩人よ！栄養補給者！ロード・キャプテンがお守りくださりますように！」

languages.text: {n}老人抓起油腻腻的卡片，开心地笑了起来。他立刻走到一旁，一边咂着嘴，一边数着卡片。{/n}“大恩人！大善人！愿舰长大人保佑你！”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man scoops up the greasy cards, grins happily, and moves aside to count them, smacking his lips.{/n} "Benefactor! Nourisher! May the Lord Captain protect you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人抓起油腻腻的卡片，开心地笑了起来。他立刻走到一旁，一边咂着嘴，一边数着卡片。{/n}“大恩人！大善人！愿舰长大人保佑你！”

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann nimmt die schmierigen Marken an sich, grinst zufrieden, tritt zur Seite, um sie zu zählen und leckt sich über die Lippen.{/n} "{mf|Wohltäter|Wohltäterin}! {mf|Nährer|Nährerin}! Der Lord Captain schütze Euch!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man scoops up the greasy cards, grins happily, and moves aside to count them, smacking his lips.{/n} "Benefactor! Nourisher! May the Lord Captain protect you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann nimmt die schmierigen Marken an sich, grinst zufrieden, tritt zur Seite, um sie zu zählen und leckt sich über die Lippen.{/n} "{mf|Wohltäter|Wohltäterin}! {mf|Nährer|Nährerin}! Der Lord Captain schütze Euch!"

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme récupère les tickets graisseux, le sourire aux lèvres, et s'écarte pour les compter.{/n} « {mf|Bienfaiteur|Bienfaitrice} ! Grâce à vous, je ne mourrai pas de faim ! Que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} vous protège ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man scoops up the greasy cards, grins happily, and moves aside to count them, smacking his lips.{/n} "Benefactor! Nourisher! May the Lord Captain protect you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme récupère les tickets graisseux, le sourire aux lèvres, et s'écarte pour les compter.{/n} « {mf|Bienfaiteur|Bienfaitrice} ! Grâce à vous, je ne mourrai pas de faim ! Que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} vous protège ! »

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adam, mutlu bir şekilde kartları toplayıp saymak için bir köşeye ayırırken dudaklarını şaklatıyor.{/n} "Karnımızı doyuran kurtarıcı! Lord Kaptan sizi korusun!"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man scoops up the greasy cards, grins happily, and moves aside to count them, smacking his lips.{/n} "Benefactor! Nourisher! May the Lord Captain protect you!"
